titles.title: A bill to amend the Chinese Student Protection Act of 1992 to eliminate the offset in per country numerical level required under that Act.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/4/2009--Introduced. Amends the Chinese Student Protection Act of 1992 to eliminate the provision requiring the reduction of annual People's Republic of China (PRC) immigrant visas to offset status adjustments under such Act.
